message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $82.50, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Can you do $80?
